Comments_List: Beginning Spanish (basic vocab, present and preterite tenses, simple sentence structures).
I learned a lot of basic Spanish as well as many cultural insights about Latin American countries as well as Spanish regions.

I think it was paced perfectly and I liked the different ways we were evaluated (listening, reading, speaking, etc). I also really liked the instructor and thought she was always well-prepared and had appropriate expectations. I can't really think of any improvements, I thought it was really well structured and taught.
Strengths are that there is a lot of practical aspects during the class so we got to practice a lot.
I would definitely recommend this course and Prof. Garca to another student.
Yes, good way to learn Spanish.
